title: Pixel 3a screen shows green tint. Distorting pics and hard to read text. Seems like a hardware issue
content: Started about one week ago. Screen goes green when phone 'wakes up'. Issues is not caused by an app - I followed all the troubleshooting steps in google Support, and issue still happening. I think is a hardware issue. I bought the phone from Sprint. They told me is still under warranty, but I need to work directly with Google.
